title: Sr. Software Engineer
description:
We are Telness Tech, a rapidly emerging startup/scaleup in the teltech space. Since our launch in 2021, our SaaS solution has provided the infrastructure, experience, and expertise that telecom companies need to revolutionize the consumer experience. Our cutting-edge technology removes the complexity and expense from the equation, leaving our customers free to make telecom a joyful experience.
   

  

 As we enter a phase of international growth, with customers across the Nordics, USA, and Europe, we are looking for Senior Software Engineers to help us become the global leader in
 *#teltech!*
**About The Role**
 You will work with a team of skilled engineers and build modern architecture and technology. Our backend is built in Golang and runs in AWS using Kubernetes. Communication between backend services uses gRPC, and the front end uses React. We use both GraphQL and REST and primarily PostgreSQL databases with event sourcing, supplemented by ClickHouse for specific use cases.
   

  

 As we are still in the early stages of building the platform, you will play a crucial role in shaping, designing, and building foundational components. As the company expands, you will help us with new, interesting challenges, scaling our platform from tens of thousands of users to hundreds and millions of users.
   

  

 We have openings in multiple teams, and hiring will be based on your background, skills, and technical interests. For the right person, there might also be opportunities to take on a leading technical role, whether from day one or over time - helping the team build a clear technical vision and make strategic technology choices as we scale.
   

  

**About You**
 We think you are an experienced Sr. Software Engineer who has probably worked at several companies, including at least one startup, and growing with them from an early stage. You are currently working with Go (or similar) in a backend-focused full-stack role and are comfortable diving into occasional front-end work with React. You are excited about joining a startup journey where you will shape both product and technology while working in a small, high-autonomy team.
   

  

**What We Look For**
* 5+ years as a backend/full-stack engineer in a modern tech environment.
* Strong experience with Go (Golang) and SQL (bonus for GraphQL, React, and Typescript).
* Ability to collaborate effectively and solve complex technical problems as a team.
* Passion for technology and excitement for the challenges of continuously adapting technology and working methods to support our scaling journey.
* Take ownership of your growth and support the development of others, eager to learn and share knowledge.
* Drives technical and process improvements, actively seeking ways to enhance technology and workflows, with a motivation to implement positive changes for both the team and the company.
* Autonomous, self-motivated, likes new challenges, and takes responsibility.
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with high proficiency in English.


**What We Offer**
* Be part of a fun and inspiring startup journey with strong funding and international expansion
* An active role in building one of the telecom industry’s most innovative companies.
* Great team. Honestly – it's our main USP. We care deeply about each other and our customers.
* A proven product and business model ready to be refined and pushed globally.
* An opportunity to work with an innovative and highly regarded product that disrupts the industry.
* A high-trust, high-autonomy environment where you’re encouraged to take ownership and explore growth opportunities - for Telness Tech and yourself.
* A friendly, positive, and supportive workplace that promotes collaboration and positively challenges each other.
* Free daily breakfast, regular Friyay AWs, and fun activities!
* Hybrid work set up with an office in central Stockholm.


 Does this sound like you? Apply today!
   

  

***At this time, we are unable to support work permits or relocation.***

title: Freelance Teaching and Learning Expert - AI Tutor
description:
**About The Company**
 At Mindrift, innovation meets opportunity. We believe in using the power of collective intelligence to ethically shape the future of AI.
   

  

 Our goal? Advance the field of artificial intelligence through collaborative Generative AI projects with domain experts. The Mindrift platform allows experts to dive into a variety of tasks ranging from creating training prompts for AI models to refining AI responses for better relevance.
   

  

 You'll have the unique opportunity to contribute to AI development anywhere, at anytime. Flexible, community-focused, and innovative—without the need for developer skills.
   

  

**About The Role**
 Generative AI models are improving very quickly, and one of our goals is to make them capable of addressing specialized questions and achieving complex reasoning skills.
   

  

 In this role, you will develop complex question-answer pairs and create scoring criteria (rubrics) to evaluate and grade the quality of responses. Your work will involve:
   

  

* Generating prompts that challenge the AI and are likely to produce incorrect responses
* Defining comprehensive scoring criteria for evaluating the correctness of the AI's answers


**Requirements**
* You have a Master's degree and/or PhD in the following areas: Pedagogy, Education, Pedagogical Design, Educational Technology, Educational Psychology, Teaching, Methodology, Tutoring, Human Resources
* You have at least 3 years of professional experience at schools & universities (as teachers, tutors, lecturers, etc.) and/or experience in curriculum development, educational technology etc.
* Your level of English is proficient (C2)
* You are familiar with different pedagogical frameworks, learner types, ability levels
* You are able to create engaging content through mix of personalization, motivation, gamification, etc
* You are ready to learn new methods, able to switch between tasks and topics quickly and sometimes work with challenging, complex guidelines
* Our freelance role is fully remote so, you just need a laptop, internet connection, time available and enthusiasm to take on a challenge


**Benefits**
**Why you should apply for this freelance role:**
* Take part in a part-time, remote, freelance project that works with your schedule and commitments
* Be part of an exciting AI project
* Enrich your portfolio with new experience
* Make a tangible impact on the quality of AI

title: Tech Lead Manager
description:
**About Sinch**
 Sinch is pioneering the way the world communicates. More than 150,000 businesses — including Google, Uber, Paypal, Visa, Tinder, and many others — rely on Sinch's Customer Communications Cloud to power engaging customer experiences through mobile messaging, voice, and email.
   

  

 Whether you need to verify users or craft omnichannel campaigns, Sinch makes it easy. Our AI-infused Super Network, APIs, and applications ensure you can connect with your customers reliably and securely, at every step of their journey.
   

  

 At Sinch we "Dream Big", "Win Together", "Keep it simple", and "Make it Happen". These values are our foundation!
   

  

**Description**
 You will act as both Tech Lead and Manager, in a perfect mix of leading people (Team of Developers) and developing code. Our aim is to consolidate the team of developers that you will lead in Stockholm. You will collaborate with your Product Partner, regarding planning and building the right products at the right time. You will be responsible for defining clear goals for your team and lead them in delivering on those goals.
   

  

 Apart from this, you are also responsible for setting salaries, helping individuals on your team grow and developing, as well as contributing technically to the team.
   

  

 As Tech Lead Manager you have a holistic perspective and the ability to inspire and lead others. You love working with tech and have experience working as a developer, working with code reviews, testing and quality assurance. You have at least one area where your team can rely on you making strong technical contributions.
   

  

* Communicate and collaborate with stakeholders
* Define quarterly goals and do weekly follow-ups
* Support and make sure the team members are the best they can be
* Develop and coach your team members individually
* Facilitate daily stand-ups and advise on agile WoW
* Contribute technically (wherever your strong area is) to the team


**Requirements**
* MSc/BS in computer science or similar degree
* Experience working as a Manager for a Tech Team
* Working in different contexts and organisations
* Interest in leadership and developing teams
* Proficient in English, both verbal and written
* Business minded and able to see the big picture
* A natural leader who is caring and inspiring
* Able to communicate clearly, both with your team and stakeholders
* Well organized and goal oriented


**Our Hiring Process**
 We are committed to ensuring a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and inclusive. Our approach includes structured, competency-based interviews designed to evaluate your skills, experience, and qualifications relevant to the role. At times, we may include a data-driven assessment to enhance our hiring success and identify candidates likely to excel.
   

  

 We believe in a two-way process and encourage you to ask questions throughout the journey. If this role isn't what you're looking for, please explore the other opportunities listed on our career page: https://www.sinch.com/careers/. No matter who you are, we hope you find an exciting path forward - hopefully with us!

title: Fullstack-utvecklare
description:
Valtech söker en erfaren Fullstack-utvecklare till vårt dynamiska team i Stockholm. Har du erfarenhet av .NET och React och vill vara med och skapa innovativa, skalbara lösningar? Då är detta rollen för dig! Ansök idag och bli en del av vårt kreativa och växande team.
   

  

**Om Rollen**
 Som Fullstack-utvecklare hos Valtech får du en central roll där du både fungerar som teknisk rådgivare och praktisk utvecklare. Du kommer att vara involverad i hela projektets livscykel – från discovery till leverans. I rollen arbetar du nära både interna team och våra kunder för att skapa lösningar som gör verklig skillnad.
   

  

**Dina Arbetsuppgifter**
* Agera som pålitlig rådgivare för våra kunder och bidra till att hitta tekniska lösningar som matchar deras affärsbehov.
* Samarbeta med tvärfunktionella team för att designa och implementera fullstacklösningar.
* Delta i workshops, kundmöten och presentationer för att säkerställa att projekten genomförs effektivt och transparent.
* Ständigt bidra till förbättring av våra utvecklingsmetoder och processer.


**Om Dig**
 Vi söker en Fullstack-utvecklare med cirka 5 års erfarenhet och ett genuint intresse för att utveckla både front-end och back-end lösningar. Du är en lagspelare som trivs i samarbete och har förmågan att översätta affärsbehov till hållbara tekniska lösningar.
   

  

**Dina Kvalifikationer**
* Cirka 5 års erfarenhet av fullstack-utveckling.
* God erfarenhet av teknologier som .NET Core, C#, React, TypeScript, Vue, Node.js och GraphQL.
* Förmåga att arbeta med API-integrationer och CMS-teknologier (t.ex. headless CMS).
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta i agila miljöer med verktyg som Jira och Confluence.
* Flytande svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.
* Du har också möjlighet att arbeta på plats i Stockholmsområdet.


**Bonus Om Du Har Erfarenhet Av**
* Angular, Ruby on Rails, eller CMS/e-handelsplattformar som Sitecore, Optimizely och Adobe.
* Erfarenhet av molnplattformar som Azure eller AWS.


**Vad Vi Erbjuder**
 På Valtech får du arbeta med några av de mest innovativa projekten och kunderna. Vi erbjuder en inkluderande och stimulerande arbetsmiljö där kreativitet och teknisk utveckling går hand i hand. Här får du möjlighet att växa tillsammans med företaget och ta ansvar för spännande utmaningar.
   

  

**Valtechs Kultur**
 Vår kultur präglas av våra värderingar: Share, Care, Dare. Vi tror på samarbete, omtanke och mod att ta initiativ. Här får du möjlighet att arbeta tillsammans med passionerade kollegor som strävar efter att skapa de bästa lösningarna för våra kunder. Vi lägger stor vikt vid att ha roligt och att utvecklas tillsammans.

title: Embedded Developer
description:
Coalesce Management Consultancy (CMC) have an consulting assignment available for an Embedded Android Test Developer to work on a project we have in Stockholm.
 



  





  





 CMC provide expert engineering solutions on an international capacity for Embedded Software and other Advanced Engineering projects. Established in 2016, we set out our mission to be the best service-driven consulting business in global STEM markets, and after rapid growth in just a few years, we’re already delivering true expertise to major technology brands and leading companies around the world.
 



  





  





 As we expand our reach and take on new projects, we have assignments available for experienced embedded technology professionals to join our consultancy and deliver the expert solutions and high level of service we’re known for across multiple ventures.
 



  





  





 By partnering with CMC you get the chance to work with some of the world’s leading technology specialists. From our global offices we support you with each new project, providing a complete scope of work definition ahead of any engagement so you know exactly what’s required by the assignment, before you land on-site. As the project is completed we can continue to work with you by setting up your next project from our global network of leading technology companies.
 



  





  





**Join our latest project**




  





  





 Currently we’re looking for an Embedded Android Test Developer to help us provide solutions on a project based in Stockholm.
 



  





  





 You’ll be involved in:
 


* New Test Development working with infra-red cameras
* Writing tests but also conducting scripts for the testing
* Understanding demands and understanding the code
* Working with legacy code and implementing tests and programing etc.



  





  





 In order to suit the project requirements you must have:
 


* Experience with Android on Embedded Systems
* Experience within test development is ideal but if you are a developer with a keen interest in working on test development, that will suffice
* A good understanding of the Linux platform
* 3+ years' experience, flexible dependent on skill and experience



  





  





 If you have the relevant capability and are interested in pursuing this assignment, talk to our sales consultants today. sam.ingram@cmcexpertisedelivered.com
 



  





  





**Get in touch**




  





  





 Learn more about Coalesce Management Consulting, our projects and the support we provide to our consultants at https://expertisedelivered.com
 



  





  





 No terminology in this advert is intended to discriminate on the grounds of age or experience, and we confirm that we are happy to accept applications from persons of any age or experience for this role.

title: Senior Fullstack Developer (Java/Javascript)
description:
**Välkommen till B3 Innovation – där teknik och trivsel går hand i hand!**
 Välkommen till B3 Innovation, hjärtat av systemutveckling inom B3 Consulting Group! Här kombinerar vi den familjära känslan från ett småföretag med storbolagets resurser.
   

  

 Vi är ett engagerat gäng med konsulter som specialiserar oss på systemutveckling inom Java och moderna JavaScriptramverk. I en miljö där du får möjlighet att växa både professionellt och personligt i en inkluderande gemenskap. Oavsett om du är en passionerad cyklist eller en bokslukare, så finns det plats för dig hos oss.
   

  

**Om rollen som fullstackutvecklare inom Java/** 
 Javascript på B3 Innovation
   

  

 Som Senior fullstackutvecklare hos oss kommer du att:
   

  

* utveckla högkvalitativa och skalbara lösningar
* samarbeta med ett tvärfunktionellt team av experter
* Delta i design och arkitektur av nya system.


**Om dig**
 Vi söker dig som har god erfarenhet och arbetat i fullstackrollen under en längre tid. Du som har hunnit både göra misstag och även lära av dem. Förhoppningsvis tycker du om att arbeta i team, dela med dig av dina kunskaper och vill fortsätta att lära dig nytt.
   

  

 Våra krav för att du ska passa i denna roll:
   

  

* Du behärskar svenska i tal och skrift.
* Du har minst 5 års erfarenhet av utvecklarrollen.
* Du har god kunskap att jobba med Java, Javascript, Kotlin, Spring, Microservices.
* Du har god kunskap att jobba med olika ramverk som React, Angular och Vue.
* Du har erfarenhet av att jobba i agila team.


**Varför B3 Innovation?**
* Innovativ Kultur: Vi uppmuntrar kreativitet och nya idéer.
* Inkluderande miljö: Vi värdesätter mångfald och strävar efter en arbetsplats där alla känner sig välkomna.
* Balans och flexibilitet: Flexibilitet är centralt, vilket gör att du kan forma din arbetsdag för att få livspusslet att gå ihop. Vi förstår vikten av balans mellan arbete och fritid och erbjuder därför flexibla arbetstider.
* Gemenskap: Hos oss blir du en del av ett stöttande team som arbetar tillsammans för att nå gemensamma mål. Det handlar inte bara om “jobb jobb jobb” hos oss. Vi anordnar allt från tech-workshops till sociala aktiviteter som stickcaféer, spelkvällar och AW.


**Om B3 Innovation**
 Vi är kända för vårt fokus på innovation och förmåga att leverera värde till våra kunder. Genom att kombinera djup teknisk expertis med en stark förståelse för våra kunders verksamhet, skapar vi lösningar som verkligen gör skillnad. Vår kultur bygger på öppenhet, samarbete och en passion för teknik.
   

  

 Vi prioriterar personlig utveckling och erbjuder verktyg som B3 Academy, TechTalks och "Lunch & Learn" för att du ska kunna växa.
   

  

 Upptäck möjligheterna med B3 Innovation. Som utvecklare får du arbeta inom spännande branscher som media, bank och finans, energi, offentlig sektor, telekom och e-handel. Oavsett om du optimerar TV-sändningar, utvecklar digitala banktjänster eller skapar smarta hem, hjälper vi dig att hitta det perfekta uppdraget som matchar dina intressen.
   

  

 Våra toppbetyg i medarbetarundersökningar visar att nöjda kollegor är kärnan i vår framgång. Är du redo att kliva in i en miljö där utveckling och trivsel går hand i hand?
   

  

 Som sagt, välkommen till B3 Innovation – vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!
   

  

**Är du redo att ta nästa steg?**
 Skicka in din ansökan idag och bli en del av vårt engagerade och innovativa team!
   

  

 Om du är mer nyfiken på oss så kan du läsa mer om oss här: https://www.b3.se/innovation
   

  

 Om du har funderingar så hör gärna av dig till Kenneth Andersson på +46706678050 alt mail kenneth.andersson@b3.se.

title: Senior Game Developer
description:
**About MAG (in brief!)**
 At MAG Interactive we make mobile games that feel good. As a part of this fun and dynamic industry, it’s our mission to spread joy to players around the world. With over 350 million downloads globally, we credit our success to our awesome colleagues and we hope you'll join the team
   

  

**Job Description: Senior Game Developer**
 At MAG, we’re looking for a talented and experienced Senior Game Developer to
 **develop high-performance game cores** 
 . This role is perfect for someone who excels in crafting scalable, reusable systems with robust architecture, ensuring smooth and efficient gameplay.
   

  

 You’ll help build the core mechanics for games like Match-3, TileMatch, and Solitaire, creating systems that are not just fun to play but also smooth, solid, and built to last.
   

  

**What You’ll Be Doing**
* Develop game cores such as Match-3, TileMatch, and Solitaire in Unity using C#, ensuring they’re snappy, polished, and reusable across multiple projects.
* Build and refine game mechanics with a focus on player experience, considering timing, animations, and overall gameplay feel.
* Design and implement tools around the game core, such as editors, to support smooth content creation and iteration.
* Refactor and maintain existing codebases, ensuring they are easily extendable, scalable and built for performance.
* Collaborate with teammates to align on game feel, art and technical needs.
* Write structured, testable, and extendable code that supports growth and scalability. Optimize for performance and readability.


**What We’re Looking For**
* Strong experience in game development, particularly in building and refining game cores and mechanics.
* A solid understanding of software engineering principles, with the ability to design and maintain scalable, shareable architectures.
* A proven track record of developing tools like level editors that enhance the game development process.
* Expertise in writing clean, performant, and maintainable code.
* A good feel for timing, animations, and gameplay flow, with an eye for the player’s perspective.
* A passion for collaboration, creativity, and continuously improving both processes and products.


**Nice to have:** 
  

  

* Tech art knowledge, such as shaders or visual effects could be a bonus skill.


**Perks And Benefits**
* Generous company bonus
* Company mobile phone and contract
* Favorable pension and private health insurance package
* Flexible work hours
* Seasonal kick-offs
* Gym allowance
* Generous learning and development budget
* Monthly After works
* Enhanced parental leave
* Company wide carbon off-setting and CSR initiatives
* Free Swedish lessons (if you wish to learn a new language!)


**At MAG, we want all of our employees to feel valued, appreciated and empowered to bring their true selves to work!**
**Our recruitment processes are designed to prevent bias and discrimination against people regardless of; gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, religion, ethnicity, age, neurodiversity, disability status, or any other aspect.**
**About MAG**
 We are MAG Interactive – a leading mobile developer and publisher of casual mobile games built on a wealth of creativity and passion. We thrive on creating quality experiences that make our players want to come back for more. And Players agree! Combined, the Company’s games have been downloaded more than 350 million times. We create a good times factory with a global reach that continues to grow.
   

  

 We are all part of a creative, positive and trusting environment where everyone has a sense of ownership over their activities and pride in their work. This open and collaborative working culture at MAG is key to our ability to continuously create top notch games.
   

  

 Every game released from MAG Interactive has reached a multi-million player base and reached the #1 position in its category in a large number of countries. Our games have been selected Best of Google Play, Best Of App Store by Apple and have reached the #1 word game spot in over 100 countries.
   

  

 MAG Interactive was founded in Stockholm in 2010.

title: ServiceNow Developer
company_industry: Defense and Space Manufacturing, Security and Investigations, and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
*ServiceNow på Saab växer och vi söker nu DIG som vill bli en del av vårt utvecklings-team!*
 Din roll
   

  

 Vi letar efter dig som har gedigen erfarenhet från utveckling i ServiceNow, där du också har viss kunskap i arkitektur. Som utvecklare arbetar du nära verksamheten och våra kravställare varför vi gärna ser att du har intresse och förståelse för uppgifter som man har som Business Analyst. För att trivas i vårt gäng sporras du av att jobba i en komplex utvecklingsmiljö som är i ständig förändring.
   

  

 Till vårt högpresterande team söker vi dig som är självgående och tar dig an uppgiften att utveckla och förvalta vårt ServiceNow med stort driv och engagemang. Plattformen används av dryga 22.000 medarbetare och vårt gemensamma mål är att skapa värdefulla och enkla interaktioner för alla dessa användare. Vår förvaltning består av olika team baserat på produktareor där Utvecklare, Business Analysts, UX designers, Service Managers, Arkitekter och Service Owner ingår.
   

  

 Några av dina arbetsuppgifter kan vara:
   

  

* Skapa och förvalta Business rules, Client script, Script includes, ACL, Integrationer mm.
* Utveckla flöden i olika delar av ServiceNow
* Analysera krav och omsätta till tekniska specifikationer
* Delta i workshops och dialoger med verksamhet/kund
* Delta i arkitekturdiskussioner i syfte att bygga långsiktiga lösningar


 Exempel på Produkter/areor som man kan komma att arbeta med är App Engine (uppskapande av customappar, ServiceNow Studio etc), Platform (Performance Analytics, CMDB, Instance health etc) och SPM/APM.
   

  

 Din profil
   

  

 Gillar du att utmanas av komplexa frågeställningar, samarbeta och skapa värdefull utveckling? Då har du hittat rätt! För att passa hos oss är en prestigelös person som hela tiden strävar efter nya kunskaper och lärdomar samt att bli ditt bästa jag. Du trivs att jobba agilt, tar gärna egna initiativ och är hjälpsam av din natur. Vidare är du analytiskt lagd, nyfiken på teknik och kan arbeta både med detaljer och ett helhetsperspektiv.
   

  

 För att lyckas i rollen ser vi gärna att du har erfarenhet inom följande områden:
   

  

* Relevant akademisk utbildning eller motsvarande erfarenhet
* Utveckling i ServiceNow
* Javascript
* Erfarenhet av att utveckla och automatisera flöden/processer i ServiceNow
* Haft workshops och dialog med verksamhet/kund
* Arbetat med förvaltning, felsökning och incidenthantering


 Vi ser det som meriterande om du har erfarenhet av:
   

  

* On-prem / Self-hosted
* Uppgradering av ServiceNow
* Implementation av ServiceNow eller någon av dess moduler.


 Vidare är det positivt om du har certifikat inom ServiceNow
 *(exempelvis: Certified System Administrator (CSA), Certified Application Developer (CAD), Certified Implementation Specialist ,* 
*TSM (CIS ITSM))* 
*Strategic Portfolio Management (SPM) Fundamentals, ServiceNow CIS – Application Portfolio Management , CIS- SPM*
 Befattningen kräver att du genomgår och godkänns enligt vid var tid gällande bestämmelser för säkerhetsskydd. För befattningar där Saab har krav på säkerhetsklassinplacering kan, i förekommande fall, medföra krav på visst medborgarskap
   

  

 På Saab kommer du bli anställd inom Group IT. Group IT är en central funktion på Saab som verkar för alla våra verksamhetsområden och ansvarar för att möjliggöra Saabs verksamhet globalt genom att tillhandahålla erforderliga produkter och tjänster inom informationsteknologi med höga krav bland annat på IT säkerhet.
   

  

 Vad du blir en del av
   

  

 Bakom våra innovationer finns alla de som har gjort det möjligt. Modiga pionjärer och kluriga tänkare. Vardagshjältar och kreativa problemlösare. De som delar djup kunskap och de som utforskar nya områden. Och alla däremellan.
   

  

 Här har du chansen att påverka och bidra på ditt unika sätt. Allt från att utveckla kod och bygga imponerande försvars- och säkerhetslösningar till att ta en kaffe med en kollega. Varje bidrag räknas. Vi ger dig möjlighet att anta utmaningar och skapa smarta innovationer. I vår vänliga och tekniksmarta värld finns plats för dig att växa. Vi finns här för att tillsammans skapa trygghet för människor och samhällen.
   

  

 Saab är ett ledande försvars- och säkerhetsföretag med uppdrag att hjälpa nationer att skydda sin befolkning och bidrar till trygghet för människor och samhällen. Med 25,500 talangfulla medarbetare utvecklar Saab teknik och lösningar för en säkrare och mer hållbar värld.
   

  

 Saab utvecklar, tillverkar och underhåller avancerade system inom flygteknik, vapen, ledningssystem, sensorer och undervattenssystem. Saab har sitt huvudkontor i Sverige men en global verksamhet där Saab är en del av många nationers försvarsförmåga. Läs mer om oss här.
   

  

 Vänligen observera att vi arbetar med löpande urval och tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum har gått ut.

title: Senior Utvecklare .Net
description:
*Länsförsäkringar AB söker nu en erfaren och drivkraftig .Net-utvecklare. Är du redo att ta dig an denna spännande roll och vara en nyckelspelare i vår digitaliseringsresa? Ansök nu och bli en del av vårt framgångsrika team!*
**Om jobbet**
 Vi söker en erfaren .Net-utvecklare som kommer att spela en central roll i vidareutvecklingen av vår tjänst Questionnaire Services, som är kärnan i Länsförsäkringars KYC-process och anti-pengatvätt. Med din erfarenhet, intresse och driv kommer du även agera bollplank till arkitekterna för att gemensamt ta fram innovativa lösningar för att möta nya krav och kontinuerlig förbättring.
   

  

 Rollen ingår i ett Kompetensteam med likasinnade systemutvecklare som har olika erfarenheter men samma driv att skapa något bra och långsiktigt hållbart. Den erfarna .Net-utvecklare vi söker kommer vara en viktig del av vårt agila utvecklingsteam inom Gemensam Kund- och Masterdata. Rollen innebär att arbeta i en dynamisk miljö där det agila arbetssättet präglar vardagen med Daily Standups, parprogrammering och andra agila ceremonier. Obekväma arbetstider kan förekomma då vi har planerade månadsreleaser kvällstid.
   

  

 Dina ansvarsområden är följande:
   

  

* Vidareutveckla och förstärka tjänsten Questionnaire Services för att säkerställa Länsförsäkringars efterlevnad av gällande regelverk
* Fungera som en viktig accelerator för digitalisering genom att utveckla och förbättra tjänstens funktioner
* Samarbeta nära arkitekter för att säkerställa att utvecklingen följer höga kvalitetsstandarder och möter kraven på datakvalitet


**Vem är du?**
 Vi söker en passionerad och erfaren .Net-utvecklare med följande kvalifikationer och egenskaper:
   

  

* Praktisk erfarenhet av utveckling inom .Net C# och React (eller annat ramverk för webbappliktioner)
* Minst 5 års praktisk erfarenhet av systemutveckling inom C# .NET, med fokus på .Net Core, API:er och React
* Förståelse för AzureDevOps, CI/CD pipelines, GIT, Powershell, IIS, automatiska verktyg för kodgranskning eller liknande verktyg
* Kompetens inom message queuing, databaser och loggning
* Erfarenhet av agila arbetssätt som Scrum, Kanban eller liknande, på LF använder vi SAFe
* Erfarenhet av testdriven utveckling (TDD), DevOps, DevSecOps och automation
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta i miljöer med komplexa och affärskritiska systemsamband
* Erfarenhet av att vägleda och coacha juniora utvecklare. Du tycker om att dela med dig av din kunskap och ser till att teamet växer och utvecklas. Du säkerställer att produktens leveranser håller hög kvalitet genom att använda best practices och genomföra kodgranskningar
* Det är meriterande om du tidigare har arbetat inom regelverksstyrda utvecklingsmiljöer, antipengatvätt, eller säkerhetsprocesser inom bank- och försäkringsverksamhet


 Som person är du drivkraftig och självgående med en förmåga att både arbeta självständigt och i team. Din lösningsorienterade inställning och positiva syn på utmaningar kommer att vara till stor nytta i rollen. Du trivs med att samarbeta och tar initiativ till att stötta, vara mentor till juniora kollegor samt onboarda nya kollegor. Med självledarskap och förmågan att agera som mentor bidrar du till ett engagerande arbetsmiljö.
   

  

**Om oss**
 Hos oss kommer du att ges möjligheten att över tid delta och bidra i olika utvecklingsteam, vilket ger dig chansen att lära dig och utmanas inom nya miljöer och tekniker. Vi tror på att skapa en stimulerande och utvecklande arbetsmiljö där du kan växa långsiktigt med oss. Vi tror att en lärande organisation är en viktig del för vår långsiktiga utveckling och tror att rätt kandidater har en stark vilja och nyfikenhet att lära sig nya saker och utmana sig själva.
   

  

**Mer information**
*Låter det spännande? Då vill vi veta mer om dig! Välkommen med din ansökan redan idag. Vi arbetar löpande med denna rekrytering och kan komma att tillsätta tjänsten innan sista ansökningsdag.*
**Sista ansökningsdag: 2025-03-14**

title: Lead C# Developer to the Pricing & Billing Team | SEB, Solna
description:
SEB is more than just a bank with an IT function. We are a tech company powered by innovation and fueled by collaboration. From COBOL to AI and everything in between, we offer you an impressive tech stack and several technology paths. Together we're innovating and building the tech arena of the future. Are you ready to take on a new challenge? If so, you'll be interested in this opportunity!
   

  

**About the Role:** 
 As a Lead Developer in the Pricing & Billing team at SEB, you will play a crucial role in driving the development and implementation of our centralized billing systems. Our solution calculates 600 different charges and distributes millions of invoices to hundreds of thousands of SEB customers. Our core is a bought billing system, integrated with 30 plus SEB systems via a steadily growing set of in-house developed applications, where no code is older than three years. You will lead a team of talented developers, ensuring the delivery of high-quality software that meets the needs of our business and customers.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities:**
* You will participate in development and code.
* Work with our core tech stack: C#, PostgreSQL, OpenShift, GitHub actions.
* Lead and mentor a team of developers, fostering a collaborative and communicative environment.
* Conduct investigations into technical, architectural, and methodological directions, and participate in hands-on development.
* Collaborate closely with product owners and other stakeholders to define, design, and ship new features.
* Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.
* Help maintain code quality, organization, and automation.


**We are looking for a candidate with strong technical skills and a passion for leadership and communication. The ideal candidate will have:**
* Curiosity and willingness to learn new things, actively seek solutions and finds enjoyment in speaking with domain experts in both IT and business.
* Good communication and pedagogical skills, with the ability to present and discuss technical topics effectively.
* Proven experience in C# development and SOLID principles.
* Working experience with agile development practices and CI/CD.
* Enjoy analyzing, presenting, and discussing technical topics.
* Fluency in English.


**What we offer:**
* Innovative company in forefront of technology
* Extensive training and learning opportunities
* Work-life balance
* Friendly and welcoming culture


*The position is located in our office in Solna, where we work 3 days at the office and two days from home.*
**Do you want to be a part of SEB?**
 Welcome to our inclusive culture, where our shared values inspire and uplift our team. We celebrate diversity and strive to ensure every employee feels seen, heard, and valued.
   

  

 Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today, but no later than 2 minutes to midnight 2025-02-19. If you have questions about the position, please contact Anders Subotic via e-mail: anders.subotic@seb.se.
   

  

**Learn more about working at SEB** 
 www.sebgroup.com/career

title: Junior Supply Chain Developer – Shape the Future of Logistics!
company_industry: Transportation, Logistics, Supply Chain and Storage
description:
**Are you eager to start your career in supply chain development and drive innovation in logistics? Join a dynamic team and help create impactful digital solutions that streamline and optimize supply chain processes!**




 We are looking for a
 **Junior Supply Chain Developer** 
 to join a forward-thinking company and contribute to its supply chain optimization efforts. If you're passionate about technology and logistics, this is your chance to apply your skills in a real-world setting and make a difference.
   




**About the Role** 

 In this role, you will work alongside experienced professionals to develop and implement innovative solutions that improve supply chain efficiency. Your tasks will focus on creating and optimizing processes, developing new tools, and working on system integrations. You'll also have the opportunity to expand your knowledge of logistics, digital tools, and automation, all while contributing to meaningful projects within the company.
   





 Your daily tasks will include:
   




* **Developing and optimizing supply chain processes** 
 to ensure smoother and more efficient operations.
* **Using tools like Excel** 
 to analyze data and support decision-making within the supply chain.
* **Collaborating with cross-functional teams** 
 to develop digital solutions and improve the logistics strategy.
* **Integrating and managing APIs** 
 to streamline data exchange across systems.
* **Learning and applying the latest technologies** 
 such as
 **Power Platform** 
 to automate and enhance supply chain management.


**We Are Looking for You With**

 We are looking for a motivated and curious individual who thrives in a fast-paced and dynamic environment. The ideal candidate will have:
   




* **Education** 
 : Bachelor’s degree in Industrial Economy, Computer Science, or a related field.
* **Technical skills** 
 :


* Solid knowledge of
 **Excel** 
 for data analysis and reporting.
* Experience with
 **SQL** 
 or a willingness to learn (a plus).
* Familiarity with
 **API integration** 
 and a keen interest in developing technical solutions.
* Knowledge of
 **Power Platform** 
 is highly desirable, but not required.


* **Languages** 
 : Fluent in
 **English** 
 (both written and spoken).
* **Personal attributes** 
 :


* **Quick learner** 
 : Able to pick up new tools and concepts quickly and apply them effectively.
* **Curiosity** 
 : A strong desire to learn and grow in the supply chain and tech space.
* **Social** 
 : Comfortable working in a team, collaborating across functions, and communicating with stakeholders.


**You Are Offered**
* **Competitive salary** 
 and benefits package.
* **Health and wellness allowance** 
 to support your well-being.
* **Flexible working hours** 
 to ensure work-life balance.
* **Career growth opportunities** 
 in a company that values continuous development and innovation.
* **Supportive and dynamic work environment** 
 where you can develop your skills and make a real impact.


**About Our Client** 

 Our client is a leader in the logistics industry, known for driving digital transformation and implementing innovative solutions to optimize supply chain operations. The company offers a collaborative and dynamic work culture where each team member contributes to the organization’s success. If you’re looking to grow your career in supply chain development while working with cutting-edge technologies, this is the perfect place for you.
   




**About Framtiden AB**

 At Framtiden, we specialize in both staffing and recruitment. We aim to make a difference in people's lives by helping them find the right job and the right colleagues. We are experts in recruiting the right talent for the right company. Framtiden operates in seven locations across Sweden and in Oslo.
   





 For this position, you will initially be employed by Framtiden and, after a certain period, there is the opportunity to transition into a direct employment relationship with the client company.
   




**Recruitment Process**

 The recruitment process consists of the following steps:
   




- **Initial interviews** 
 with our recruitment team.

- **Reference checks** 
 to verify your professional background.

- **Final interview** 
 with the client to assess cultural fit and alignment with the team.

**Terms and Conditions**
* **Employment Type** 
 : Full-time, with the possibility to transition into a permanent role with the client after the initial period.
* **Location** 
 : Flexible location with the option for remote work.
* **Benefits** 
 : Health and wellness allowance, flexible working hours, and more.



 If you're ready to take your first step into the world of supply chain development and contribute to the optimization of logistics operations, we want to hear from you! Apply now and be part of an innovative and growing company.
   





*Join us in shaping the future of logistics! Apply today!*

title: Software Engineer MarTech
description:
**We're looking for a Software Engineer to our MarTech team!**
*This position can be based in Stockholm or Oslo.*
 As a Software Engineer within Martech at Lendo you will design, build, and maintain microservices that enable seamless integrations with key marketing technologies such as Braze, Google Ads and Google Analytics, Meta Ads, etc, as well as support and maintain the data layer implementation. You will ensure the reliability, performance, and scalability of MarTech systems while collaborating closely with specialists to deliver best-practice, efficient, and secure solutions that enhance the organization’s marketing operations.
   

  

 You will work closely with MarTech and analytics implementation specialists, as well as data engineers and data scientists in the Data and Machine Learning team, which is responsible for the entirety of data flows across all markets and brands within Lendo Group.
   

  

**Aspects Of Work Include, But Are Not Limited To**
* Microservices development: Design, develop, and maintain scalable microservices to support MarTech integrations (e.g. Google Ads Customer Match, Enhanced Conversions).
* Tool integration: Collaborate with colleagues in the Data and Machine Learning team and relevant stakeholders to implement and optimize integrations with Braze, Google Ads (Enhanced Conversions, Customer Match), Meta, Google Analytics, and other tools.
* Server-side containers: Maintain the infrastructure for the server-side tag containers and assist in building advanced server-side data collection solutions.
* System maintenance: Implement and maintain monitoring and observability solutions to ensure reliability, performance, and security of the MarTech stack.
* Code quality: Write clean, efficient, well-documented code following best practices.
* Problem-solving: Debug and resolve issues in MarTech systems, ensuring minimal downtime and impact.
* Innovation: Stay up-to-date on the latest MarTech trends and suggest improvements to existing systems and processes.

title: Product Manager - Cloud Native
description:
Canonical is a leading provider of open source software and operating systems to the global enterprise and technology markets. Our platform, Ubuntu, is very widely used in breakthrough enterprise initiatives such as public cloud, data science, AI, engineering innovation and IoT. Our customers include the world's leading public cloud and silicon providers, and industry leaders in many sectors. The company is a pioneer of global distributed collaboration, with 1200+ colleagues in 75+ countries and very few office based roles. Teams meet two to four times yearly in person, in interesting locations around the world, to align on strategy and execution.
   

  

 The company is founder led, profitable and growing.
   

  

 Canonical's product management team are technologists who have a passion for delivering products and solutions that help shape market demands while elevating open source software everywhere. This is an application track for a product management position at Canonical on Cloud Native. Apply here if you excel at leadership, communication, and technical vision, and believe you can drive product strategy for the business needs of tomorrow.
   

  

 We believe that open source is transforming the way that enterprises solve their business needs. Although open source has been around for thirty years, it is only now fundamental to every corner of the software landscape. Going forward we believe open source will have an even bigger impact as it moves into specialised vertical markets. Our goal is to make open source easier, more reliable and more secure for deployment and development. We strive to be the provider of 'most software to most companies', starting with Ubuntu but expanding to cover every class of application on every class of compute. To deliver on that ambition, we select product managers for their intellect and strong drive to advance the open source community. Together, we aim to improve open source quality, outreach, and impact. Our product managers set the vision and the direction to ensure teams deliver the right products in the right markets at the right time. They push the boundaries of the technology landscape to identify and deliver products into new and existing market opportunities.
   

  

 Juju is an open source orchestration engine for software operators that enables the deployment, integration and lifecycle management of applications at any scale, on any infrastructure using charms. Juju is currently used by our clients, partners, and the community to orchestrate both small and enterprise-scale infrastructure and application deployments across a variety of substrates.
   

  

 This role is responsible for the commercial strategy and marketing leadership of one of our cloud native operations product areas, including
   

  

* Juju - the open source orchestration engine for software operators that enables the deployment, integration and lifecycle management of applications at any scale, on any infrastructure using charms
* Identity management - defining the way authentication, authorisation and identity governance controls are applied across Ubuntu One SSO and the other Canonical products
* Observability - outlining the strategy for the way Canonical products and charms perform tracing and are able to discern the underlying system health


 Location: This role will be based remotely in the EMEA region.
   

  

 This role entails
   

  

* Lead the lifecycle of the product development by reviewing the priorities and goals for the products you are responsible for.
* Work closely with the engineering leads to oversee the product development process
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams such as engineering, design, marketing, and sales, to address common challenges across projects, to align on priorities, to make informed decisions, and to keep business execution on track
* Conduct market research, analyse industry trends, and gather customer feedback to identify opportunities, and to ensure alignment with Canonical's overall vision
* Develop your team through coaching, mentoring and training
* Establish KPIs for project status reporting and communicate it across Canonical
* Drive execution excellence through continuous feedback and improvement
* Contribute to the development of strategies to create and maintain high performing teams
* Contribute to the success of our sales team in winning new opportunities, by reviewing customer feedback and participating in customer meetings


 What we are looking for in you
   

  

* Seasoned product management experience in technical domains related to the usage and/or the management of open source software in the cloud native landscape
* Experiences designing or managing software operations for large scale distributed systems
* Good understanding of cloud native technologies such as Kubernetes, Docker containers.
* Comprehensive knowledge of the common enterprise security and compliance requirements in the area of software operations
* Proven ability to lead technical teams and drive their execution to excellence
* Passion to write about technologies and experience in the area of developer marketing
* A strong work ethic, and personal interests aligned with the open source philosophy
* Excellent communications skills in English, both verbal and written
* Willingness to travel up to 4 times a year for internal events


 Nice-to-have skills
   

  

* Experience with CNCF projects, identity or observability systems is a plus.
* Demonstrate an insatiable intellectual curiosity, and be passionate about the future of technology
* Have a strong sense of ownership. All parts of the product's success and your team's success are your responsibility.
* Be a problem solver, have the ability to think out of the box, and demonstrate visionary leadership


 What we offer you
   

  

 We consider geographical location, experience, and performance in shaping compensation worldwide. We revisit compensation annually (and more often for graduates and associates) to ensure we recognise outstanding performance. In addition to base pay, we offer a performance-driven annual bonus or commission. We provide all team members with additional benefits, which reflect our values and ideals. We balance our programs to meet local needs and ensure fairness globally.
   

  

* Distributed work environment with twice-yearly team sprints in person - we've been working remotely since 2004!
* Personal learning and development budget of USD 2,000 per year
* Annual compensation review
* Recognition rewards
* Annual holiday leave
* Maternity and paternity leave
* Employee Assistance Programme
* Opportunity to travel to new locations to meet colleagues from your team and others
* Priority Pass for travel and travel upgrades for long haul company events


**About Canonical**
 Canonical is a pioneering tech firm at the forefront of the global move to open source. As the company that publishes Ubuntu, one of the most important open source projects and the platform for AI, IoT and the cloud, we are changing the world of software. We recruit on a global basis and set a very high standard for people joining the company. We expect excellence - in order to succeed, we need to be the best at what we do. Most colleagues at Canonical have worked from home since its inception in 2004. Working here is a step into the future, and will challenge you to think differently, work smarter, learn new skills, and raise your game.
   

  

**Canonical is an equal opportunity employer**
 We are proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. Diversity of experience, perspectives, and background create a better work environment and better products. Whatever your identity, we will give your application fair consideration.

title: Lead Architect
company_industry: Software Development, IT System Custom Software Development, and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
The world is changing in the way we consume products, from ownership to usership, and DigitalRoute is positioned in the centre of the transition. Because, when enterprises pivot to usage-based business models, they often make an unfortunate discovery. Their systems weren’t built to handle the massive data volumes and complexity that usage-based models generate. This causes them to leak revenue and respond too slowly to customer demand. DigitalRoute solves this by creating a real-time usage data layer for enterprises. Our products transform raw usage data into clear information for billing, in real time and at high scale.
 



  





**About The Job** 




 The Lead MZ/PE Architect will work in one of our two main product areas, where our classic offerings called Mediation Zone and Private Edition are created. All product development is done by our own teams in Stockholm, Gothenburg, Östersund and Kuala Lumpur.
 



 The Lead MZ/PE Architect role will report directly to our global Head of Engineering.
 



  





**Responsibilities** 



* You will own and drive the software architecture work for both of these products, which have around 90% shared codebase.
* You will lead and prioritize work through collaboration, coaching, and decision-making. And you’ll do some coding as well.
* You will be working closely with PM/POs for these products, balancing business requirements and technical must-haves together.



  





 You will also be involved in other things; anything from leading investigations and improving quality to coaching AI-assisted development or recommending changes to priorities.
 



  





**The support around you** 




 You will work right next to a lot of good help; software engineering teams, PMs/POs, Security Architect, Lead Architect for the other product, management, Support, Product Documentation, etc.
 



  





**About You** 



* You have extensive experience developing transaction-safe and high-performing enterprise software in Java, including leading architectural work. If your experience is related to advanced integration or mediation, that’s even better.
* You are of course very skilled technically, but you are also communicative. You are comfortable leading meetings, explaining, discussing and collaborating, and you can prioritize, take in feedback and make decisions.
* You have a strong Java developer background, even if you may not be spending 100% of your time coding these days.
* You are quite comfortable working with cloud technologies (AWS/GCP/Azure/OCI) as well as with Docker and Kubernetes – and with Kafka and various databases.
* We often speak English in our offices, so your English needs to be good. If you also speak Swedish – great. If not, you can learn that on the job.



  





**About Us** 




 We produce some really cool things for very large and well-known customers. Many of them are already waiting for the results of the work YOU will do. Read more about the product and the company here: and here:
 



 In short? Well, we offer very advanced and high-performing automated mediation\* software for many of the world’s largest or most well-known companies. Examples? Well, how about Booking.com, Orange, Microsoft and many more?
 



  




* Advanced systems integration (kind of), but lots more and on steroids



  





**We offer** 




 Competitive salary with a good pension plan and insurances. Other nice benefits as well. Good coffee, fussball, and all that, yes.
 


* free access to Udemy learning
* we pay for AWS certifications.



  





**Location** 




 Stockholm (modern, comfy office). Hybrid work, yes.
 



  





 We apply continuous selection, and the position may be filled before the last application date. Please note that we do not take applications via e-mail.
 



  





 DigitalRoute wants to be part of an inclusive and diverse environment and we are actively looking for qualified candidates irrespective of gender, sexual orientation, ethnicity, disability, or age. You will be part of a global and diverse company where our differences are our strengths.
 



  





 Apply now! We look forward to you joining us!

title: Microsoft 365 & Azure Digital Forensics Architect
description:
Grow with us
   

  

**About This Opportunity**
 We are now searching for a senior Microsoft 365 & Azure Digital Forensics Architect, with extensive security and digital forensics expertise. In this role you will be key part of Ericsson Group Security’s Insider Threat Prevention & Security Investigations unit, which has a global responsibility covering Ericsson world-wide. You are expected to lead the design and development of state-of-the-art solutions in Microsoft 365 / Azure, leveraging their latest tools and technologies. You will also support Ericsson’s digital forensics specialists and security investigators with technical subject matter expertise.
   

  

 This role is within Ericsson Group Security’s Insider Threat Prevention & Security Investigations unit (ITP & SI), part of Ericsson’s global security organization, and is based in Ericsson’s global headquarters in Kista, Sweden.
   

  

 Join our Team
   

  

 What you will do
   

  

* Be the unit’s Microsoft 365 and Azure expert, leading the unit’s overall Microsoft Cloud architecture and strategy.
* Design, deploy, and operate highly secure, state-of-the-art eDiscovery, digital forensics, and insider threat prevention services in Microsoft 365 / Azure.
* Support Ericsson’s digital forensics specialists and security investigators in identifying, collecting, and analysing Microsoft 365 / Azure data.
* Stay up to date on Microsoft’s technical and solution roadmap relevant to eDiscovery, digital forensics, insider threat prevention, and security investigations.


 You will bring
   

  

**Mandatory Qualifications**
* A Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in computer science or related field, or equivalent experience.
* Expert knowledge of Microsoft Azure and M365, including:
* C#, ASP.Net (Razor/MVC)
* REST API’s (Microsoft Graph API’s and .net SDK)
* Azure App services and other technologies
* Azure DevOps Services (CI/CD)
* Microsoft PowerPlatform (PowerAutomate/Flow, SharePoint etc..)
* Microsoft Defender solutions
* Microsoft Purview
* Experience working according to agile principles.
* An analytical and curious mentality.
* A collaborative approach
* Willingness to teach and mentor junior colleagues
* Exceptional trouble shooting skills
* Fluent communication skills in written and spoken Swedish and English


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Experience designing, configuring, and operating Azure HCI environments
* Experience operating on-premise Windows environments (Microsoft Windows Server and SQL Server)
* Experience working in JIRA.
* Relevant Microsoft certifications. E.g.:
* PL-400: Microsoft Power Platform Developer
* Microsoft Certified: DevOps Engineer Expert
* Security certifications such as CISSP
* Knowledge of ISO27k compliance and certification requirements
* NIST Cybersecurity Framework
* Digital forensic certifications
* Knowledge of digital forensics, mobile forensics, network forensics, and eDiscovery processes, tools, and technologies


 As the position is based in Kista, Sweden, the right to live and work in Sweden is a prerequisite. Ericsson will not sponsor a work permit for this position.
   

  

 Vetting including references and relevant background screening will be conducted for final candidates.
   

  

 Location: Stockholm, Sweden
   

  

 Why join Ericsson?
   

  

 At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build never seen before solutions to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators and specialists, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.
   

  

 ]]>

title: Head of Sales & Startup Founder (March 2025)
company_industry: Venture Capital and Private Equity Principals, Software Development, and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
**Note: This is not for full-time employment, but an opportunity to build your own VC-backed startup.** 




  





**Who you are** 




 You are a seasoned sales professional with a proven track record of success. Your expertise extends beyond simply closing deals; you possess the vision and leadership qualities to build a company from the ground up. Whether you're driven by disrupting new markets or leveraging your skills for positive global impact, this opportunity offers you the chance to become a CEO and co-found a groundbreaking company.
 



  





**About Antler** 




 Antler is the world's most active venture capital firm, providing funding from pre-seed to Series C. We invest in Founders who seek to define our tomorrow and reshape the world we live in with groundbreaking technological innovation. Every year, we handpick the strongest Founders from more than 135,000 applicants across our 27 locations on the globe, which has led us to work with more than 7,000 founders to date and a portfolio of more than 1,000 startups.
 



  





**The Antler Founder Residency** 




 Join a dynamic cohort of 200+ highly motivated entrepreneurs for an immersive 12-week program. Visit our website for a detailed breakdown of how we'll support your startup launch.
 


* 12-Week full-time Immersive Journey: Kicking off March, 2025, in Stockholm.
* Co-Founder Discovery: In the first 10 weeks, collaborate with fellow Founders to find your co-founder(s).
* Pitch to Invest: Present your team and business idea to the Antler Investment Committee. Secure a net cash investment of EUR 100k for 10% equity.
* Accelerate Growth: If funded, we work closely with you to make your startup a success



  





**Program Details** 



* **Start Date:** 
 March 3rd, 2025
* **Location:** 
 Onsite at our Stockholm office
* **Compensation:** 
 While participants don't receive financial compensation during the program, pre-seed investment is available to jumpstart your venture.
* **Visa Sponsorship:** 
 Due to the non-employment nature of the program, visa sponsorship is unavailable.



  





**Application Process** 




 Our streamlined application process takes only 2-3 weeks:
 


1. Apply through our website.
2. Participate in an introductory interview.
3. Progress to an in-depth interview with our partners.
4. Receive a potential offer.



  





**Meet Our Nordic Success Stories:** 



* **Wingbits:** 
 Community-driven flight data; redefining air travel efficiency
* **Two:** 
 A comprehensive B2B payment suite simplifying sales for online and offline businesses.
* **Evyon:** 
 A developer of eco-friendly battery energy storage systems.
* **Glint Solar:** 
 Software accelerating identification of optimal solar installation sites.
* **PerPlant:** 
 AI-powered sensor systems creating a gateway to sustainable agriculture

title: Architect, ServiceNow
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting and Business Consulting and Services
description:
What makes Cognizant a unique place to work? The combination of rapid growth and an international and innovative environment! This is creating a lot of opportunities for people like YOU — people with an entrepreneurial spirit who want to make a difference in this world.
   

  

 At Cognizant, together with your colleagues from all around the world, you will collaborate on creating solutions for the world's leading companies and help them become more flexible, more innovative and successful. And this is your chance to be part of the success story: we are looking for a Service Now HRSD Developer to join our Service Now Team.
   

  

**About Cognizant Service Now Practice**
*The ServiceNow Business Group (SNBG), offers comprehensive solutions and services that leverage the powerful ServiceNow platform to streamline enterprise operations, enhance employee experiences, and drive digital transformation.* 
*Our deep understanding of end-to-end ServiceNow services empowers us to streamline processes, drive operational efficiency, and enhance customer experiences.* 

*With our comprehensive portfolio spanning ITSM, HR automation, Experience, AI, and beyond, the SNBG unlocks new growth opportunities. Leveraging our cutting-edge capabilities can propel Cognizant's business forward, delivering valuable outcomes for clients and enabling substantial high-ACV engagements for Cognizant's sales teams.*
*With over 2,400 skilled professionals dedicated to ServiceNow, the SNBG is one of the largest and most credentialed ServiceNow practices in the world.* 

**About The Role**
*As Service Now HRSD developer your will be responsible for interacting with key client stakeholders to understand their requirement around HRSD modules and implement them along with the other Service Now SMEs in Cognizant. You will also be responsible for mentoring the Cognizant team members and to train them on various HRSD related skillsets. You will be responsible for driving key client discussion on implementing HRSD modules across various projects.*

title: Sales & Project Manager
description:
**Drivs du av att bygga relationer till kunder och göra affärer? Och har branschkännedom från energi eller papper/massaindustrin? För dig med stort tekniskt intresse kan vi erbjuda en spännande roll som Sales & project manager på Valmet!**
 Som Sales & Project manager säljer du service och reservdelar till sodapannor, kraft- och värmepannor samt rökgasreningssystem. Du ansvarar för egna befintliga kunder (Key account manager), identifierar nya och bygger upp relationer till dem. Genom ett nära samarbete med kund förstår du deras behov för en effektiv drift och omsätter deras krav inom drift, underhåll och säkerhet till försäljning av en teknisk lösning utvecklad av Valmet. För mindre projekt är du även ansvarig projektledare för projektets genomförande.
   

  

 Våra kunder finns främst i Sverige och de närmaste kollegorna har kontor i Göteborg. Så det är en fördel om du har nära hit, men för rätt person är vi öppna för andra lösningar också.
   

  

**Din profil**
 Först och främst är du en engagerad säljare. Du brinner för att arbeta nära kund och bygga relationer ute på fältet för att kunna ta hem affären. Du har gedigen och framgångsrik erfarenhet av försäljning av tekniska lösningar och har god insyn i vad som är på gång inom energibranschen och papper- och massaindustrin i Skandinavien.
   

  

 Du bygger förtroende med ditt breda tekniska kunnande. Om du inte redan har fördjupad kunskap av just pannor, har du stort intresse och förutsättningar för att snabbt kunna lära dig. Sannolikt har du en akademisk utbildning som process eller maskiningenjör i botten.
   

  

 Att arbeta lösningsorienterat och med ett långsiktigt perspektiv är självklart för dig. Precis som att det gäller att vara på hugget för att nå resultat. Kanske arbetar du som säljare på ett mindre företag idag inom energibranchen och vill bli en del av ett större sammanhang, på ett företag som är med i hela kedjan från utveckling till tillverkning och montage hos kund?
   

  

**Vi erbjuder**
 Vi erbjuder dig en variationsrik tjänst i ett ledande globalt företag där du säljer Valmets egna produkter och lösningar. Här har du alltid ett team med bred kunskap och kompetens bakom dig.
   

  

**Övrig information**
 Fångade vi ditt intresse och du vill veta mer? Kontakta Christina Edvardsson, Director Energy Recovery Environmental Services Scandinavia, EMEA PES BU, christina.edvardsson@valmet.com, 0738 329630.
   

  

 Låter det som rätt tjänst för dig? Vi ser fram emot din ansökan via länken senast 7 mars 2025.
   

  

***When everything works together***
*Valmet is where the best talent from a wide variety of backgrounds comes together. With over 19,000 professionals around the world, we are the leading global developer and supplier of technologies, automation and services for the pulp, paper and energy industries, and serve an even wider base of process industries with our automation systems and flow control solutions. Our commitment to moving our customers’ performance forward requires creativity, technological innovations, service know-how – and above all, teamwork.*
*Join the team!* 
 www.valmet.com/careers

title: Business analyst to automotive company in Södertälje
company_industry: Transportation, Logistics, Supply Chain and Storage
description:
**Are you passionate about optimizing supply chains and developing digital solutions? Join a team that thrives on innovation, and help shape the future of logistics!**




 We are looking for a
 **Supply Chain Developer** 
 who is eager to bring their technical expertise and creative problem-solving skills to a forward-thinking company. In this role, you'll have the opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies to enhance supply chain processes, improve efficiency, and contribute to the digital transformation of a growing organization.
   




**About the Role** 

 As a Supply Chain Developer, you will play a key role in optimizing and transforming the company's supply chain operations. Your main responsibility will be developing and implementing solutions that enhance logistics strategies and ensure smooth processes from end to end. You'll be working with a team of professionals to streamline operations, integrate digital systems, and automate workflows. Your work will directly impact the overall efficiency and sustainability of the organization’s supply chain.
   





 Your day-to-day tasks will include:
   




* Developing and implementing innovative solutions for logistics and supply chain management.
* Integrating data from different sources to improve decision-making processes.
* Designing and optimizing supply chain strategies to meet the company's goals.
* Working with cross-functional teams to identify opportunities for automation and process improvement.
* Utilizing tools like PowerBI to analyze data and present actionable insights.


**We Are Looking for You With**

 We are looking for a driven and innovative individual who is passionate about supply chain management and technology. You should have the following qualifications:
   




* **Education** 
 : Bachelor's degree in Industrial Economy, Computer Science, or a related field.
* **Technical skills** 
 :


* Proficiency in
 **Java** 
 ,
 **Python** 
 , and
 **SQL** 
 .
* Experience with
 **PowerBI** 
 for data visualization and reporting.
* Knowledge of

 (a plus).
* Familiarity with

 and

 (LLM) is a merit.


* **Experience** 
 :


* At least 1 year of experience in a role such as Business Analyst, Project Manager, Product Owner, or Supply Chain Developer.
* Familiarity with logistics and supply chain operations is a plus.


* **Languages** 
 : Fluent in
 **English** 
 (both written and spoken). Knowledge of
 **Swedish** 
 is a plus.


**Personal Attributes and Behaviors**

 We are looking for someone who thrives in a dynamic environment and can adapt to changes as they come. Key personal attributes include:
   




* **Curiosity** 
 : A strong desire to learn and continuously improve.
* **Social Flexibility** 
 : Ability to adapt to new situations and shift priorities when necessary.
* **Strong Prioritization Skills** 
 : Able to efficiently manage multiple tasks and focus on what's most important at any given time.


**You Are Offered**

 and benefits package.

 to promote a healthy work-life balance.

 to support work-life harmony.

**About Our Client**

The company fosters a collaborative and dynamic work environment where every team member is empowered to contribute to the company’s success. Joining this team means becoming part of a forward-thinking organization that invests in both its employees and cutting-edge technologies.
